get.summary: Get link to file from server

200.description: Get link that allows you to view the file

post.summary: Get link to upload file on server

200.description: Get link that allows you to put the file

post.summary: Get upload links for every file in `content.json`

200.description: Returns object of key-values where key is filename, and value is file upload link

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Search by package title, not case sensitive

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Search by package description, not case sensitive

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Filter by tags. Accepts array (tags=value&tags=value2) or comma-separated string (tags=tag1,tag2)

delete.description: Delete a package. Requires DELETE_PACKAGE permission or being the package author. This will also delete all associated files and cleanup orphaned tags.

403.description: Insufficient permissions to delete this package

patch.description: Update a user's permissions. Requires 'manage_permissions' permission.

get.summary: Get users list for admin panel

username.description: Unique username, needed for identification like user search, package author

isGuest.description: Whether this is a guest user account

username.description: Display name for the guest user (1-50 characters, allows Unicode letters, numbers, spaces)
Rules: lowercase letters, numbers, underscores, periods only

permissions.description: Array of permission names to assign to the user. Replaces all existing permissions.

slot.description: Player's game slot index (0-based). Only set for players with PLAYER role.

currentQuestion.description: ID of the currently active question in round if any

tag.description: A single tag for the package

examples: Package description, should be longer than title, probably

tags.description: Tags for the package. Can be null or an array of tag objects

examples: Package description, should be longer than title, probably

tags.description: Tags for the package. Can be null or an array of tag objects

examples: Package description, should be longer than title, probably

PackageTags.description: Tags filter; can also be provided as comma-separated string

examples: You don't have permission to perform this action
Authentication is failed, please try again

PackageFileType.description: Type of media file for package-related files

QuestionType.description: Type of question within a package

QuestionShowDelay.description: Delay before showing options in milliseconds

QuestionPriceMultiplier.description: Multiplier for question price nominal, so if price 200 with 2x multiplier it will give +400 and -0, depends if answer correct

QuestionMaxPrice.description: Maximum price for the stake question, most useful when type is forEveryone - Does not allow top players to go all-in and win. Typically maxPrice can be 2x or 3x of nominal price

QuestionAllowedPrices.description: Allowed price options for customPrice subtype. Maximum 5 prices to choose

file.description: File associated with the answer option

QuestionChoiceAnswers.description: Multiple choice options; minimum 2, maximum 8 answers

FileInput.description: Basic file metadata for upload, used in place of full File model for input

PackageLogoFileInput.description: Logo file structure for package creation. Only images acceptable

PackageLogoFileItem.description: Logo file structure for package creation. Only images acceptable

PackageEntitiesOrder.description: Order of the round/theme/question file in package data, should be unique, starting from 0

PackageQuestionFile.description: Question media file structure for package creation

price.description: Price is null only if price is hidden

answerDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before being able to answer, if applicable

showAnswerDuration.description: Duration in milliseconds for showing the answer

questionComment.description: Comment or note about the question
examples: You have to say full country name

PackageQuestion.description: Base properties for all question types

subType.description: Subtype of the secret question. customPrice means player can choose cost of question

allOf.description: Secret question type. allowedPrices required only if subType is customPrice

subType.description: Subtype of the no-risk question. forEveryone means everyone answers it, basically giving chances for everyone, instead of one player
Subtype of the stake question. simple is basically auction. forEveryone means everyone place some amount of money and write answer

PackageQuestionUnion.description: Polymorphic question union for all question types

examples: In this theme you have to guess anime by it's opening song

tags.description: Tags for the package. Can be null or an array of tag objects

PackageCreateInputData.description: Input for creating a new package; author is set via authentication

muted.description: If true - player muted in in-game chat

restricted.description: Restricted players can only join as spectators

banned.description: If true - player is banned from the game

PlayerData.description: Player DTO. This is also sent to everyone when player joins game

slot.description: Slot null has only showman and spectators

mediaDownloaded.description: Whether the player has downloaded the current question's media

targetSlot.description: Optional target slot for player role. If not provided, first available slot will be assigned. Only applicable when role is PLAYER.

user.description: Emitted to everyone in game, including sender. ID of the user who left the game

SocketIOChatMessageEventPayload.description: Emitted to everyone in game, including sender. Data that sent to all players in room on chat message

user.description: ID of the user who sent the message

SocketIOUserChangeEventPayload.description: Data sent to subscribed players when a user's information is updated

SocketIOGameJoinEventPayload.description: This data sent to player when he joins game

answeringPlayer.description: Id of player who is currently answering

skippedPlayers.description: IDs of players who skipped the question

currentTurnPlayerId.description: Id of player whose turn it is to pick a question or eliminate theme

oneOf.description: Array of player IDs who are ready to start the game

secretQuestionData.description: Secret question specific data - only set when a secret question is picked

stakeQuestionData.description: Stake question specific data - only set when a stake question is picked

durationMs.description: Describes how long timer should last until it's ended

elapsedMs.description: This value written only when timer paused because of something. Helps to track passed time and resume timer correctly

resumedAt.description: Describes when timer was resumed after pause or restored from saved state. Null if timer was never paused/resumed. Helps users joining mid-game calculate correct elapsed time.

SocketIOGameStartEventPayload.description: This data sent to all players in room when game is started

SocketIOPlayerReadinessEventPayload.description: This data is sent to all players in room when a player changes their ready status

playerId.description: ID of the player who changed their ready status

isReady.description: Whether the player is ready or not

readyPlayers.description: Array of all currently ready player IDs

autoStartTriggered.description: Optional field indicating if game auto-start was triggered

SocketIOGameStateRoundData.description: Info about current round of the game

examples: This package is focused on anime questions

SocketIOGameStateThemeData.description: Info about theme of the round

examples: In this theme you have to guess character name

SocketIOGameStateQuestionData.description: Info about question of the theme

price.description: Price is null only if price is hidden

questionComment.description: Comment that clarify what have to be answered on this question

isPlayed.description: Marks if question was played before to disable picking action

SocketIOGameSkipEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when player skips a question

playerId.description: ID of the player who skipped the question

MediaDownloadStatusEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when a player downloads media

playerId.description: ID of the player who downloaded media

mediaDownloaded.description: Whether the player has downloaded media

allPlayersReady.description: Whether all active players have downloaded media

timer.description: Question timer (only present when allPlayersReady is true)

SocketIOGameUnskipEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when player unskips a question

playerId.description: ID of the player who unskipped the question

SocketIOGamePauseEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when the game is paused

SocketIOGameUnpauseEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when the game is unpaused

SocketIOPlayerKickInput.description: Data sent to kick a player from the game (showman only)

playerId.description: ID of the player to kick

SocketIOPlayerKickEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when a player is kicked

playerId.description: ID of the player who was kicked

SocketIOPlayerRestrictionInput.description: Data sent to update player restrictions (showman only)

playerId.description: ID of the player to restrict

SocketIOPlayerRestrictionEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when player restrictions are updated

playerId.description: ID of the player whose restrictions were updated

SocketIOPlayerRoleChangeInput.description: Data sent to change a player's role

playerId.description: ID of the player whose role to change

newRole.description: The new role for the player

SocketIOPlayerRoleChangeEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when a player's role is changed

playerId.description: ID of the player whose role was changed

newRole.description: The new role of the player

players.description: Updated list of all players with their current data

SocketIOPlayerScoreChangeInput.description: Data sent to change a player's score (showman only)

playerId.description: ID of the player whose score to change

newScore.description: The new score for the player

SocketIOPlayerScoreChangeEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when a player's score is changed

playerId.description: ID of the player whose score was changed

newScore.description: The new score of the player

SocketIOPlayerSlotChangeInput.description: Data sent to change a player's slot

targetSlot.description: The target slot to change to (0-indexed)

playerId.description: Optional: ID of the player whose slot to change (for showman use)

SocketIOPlayerSlotChangeEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when a player changes their slot

playerId.description: ID of the player who changed their slot

players.description: Updated list of all players with their current data

SocketIOTurnPlayerChangeInput.description: Data sent to change the current turn player (showman only)

newTurnPlayerId.description: ID of the player who should have the turn, or null to clear

SocketIOTurnPlayerChangeEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when the turn player is changed

newTurnPlayerId.description: ID of the player who now has the turn, or null if cleared

SocketIOQuestionPickEventInput.description: Send this data to pick a question

SocketIOQuestionDataEventPayload.description: Data sent to players when a question is picked, containing question details and timer

SocketIOQuestionAnswerEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when a player starts answering a question

userId.description: ID of the user who is answering

SocketIOAnswerSubmittedEventData.description: Data sent to all players when a player submits an answer. Same data should be sent by answering player to the server

SocketIOAnswerResultEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when the showman evaluates an answer

SocketIOAnswerShowStartEventPayload.description: Signal event sent to all players when the show-answer phase starts. This phase displays the correct answer after a response. No payload - just a transition signal.

SocketIOAnswerShowEndEventPayload.description: Signal event sent to all players when the show-answer phase ends. Game returns to question choosing state. No payload - just a transition signal.

SocketIOAnswerResultInput.description: Data sent by the showman to evaluate a player's answer

scoreResult.description: Score result of the answer; positive for correct, negative for incorrect, zero for skip

SocketIOSecretQuestionPickedEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when a secret question is picked

pickerPlayerId.description: ID of the player who picked the secret question

transferType.description: Transfer type determining who can receive the question

questionId.description: ID of the picked secret question

SocketIOSecretQuestionTransferInputData.description: Data sent by a player to transfer a secret question to another player

targetPlayerId.description: ID of the player who should receive the secret question

SocketIOSecretQuestionTransferEventPaylo.description: Data sent to all players when a secret question is transferred

fromPlayerId.description: ID of the player who transferred the question

toPlayerId.description: ID of the player who received the question

questionId.description: ID of the transferred secret question

price.description: Price is null only if price is hidden

answerDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before being able to answer, if applicable

showAnswerDuration.description: Duration in milliseconds for showing the answer

questionComment.description: Comment or note about the question
examples: You have to say full country name

ThemeEliminateInput.description: Data sent to eliminate a theme in final round

themeId.description: ID of the theme to eliminate

ThemeEliminateOutput.description: Data sent to all players when a theme is eliminated in final round

eliminatedBy.description: ID of the player who eliminated the theme

nextPlayerId.description: Next player to pick theme, null if elimination complete

FinalAnswerSubmitInput.description: Data sent by player to submit final answer in final round

FinalAnswerSubmitOutput.description: Data sent to all players when a final answer is submitted

playerId.description: ID of the player who submitted the answer

FinalBidSubmitInput.description: Data sent by player to submit bid in final round

FinalBidSubmitOutput.description: Data sent to all players when a bid is submitted

playerId.description: ID of the player who submitted the bid

isAutomatic.description: Whether the bid was automatically submitted (e.g., when player disconnects during bidding phase)

FinalAnswerReviewInput.description: Data sent by showman to review a final answer

answerId.description: ID of the answer being reviewed

FinalAnswerReviewOutput.description: Data sent to all players when an answer is reviewed

playerId.description: ID of the player whose answer was reviewed
ID of the player submitting the answer

isCorrect.description: Whether the answer is correct (null if not yet reviewed)

autoLoss.description: Whether this is an automatic loss

turnOrder.description: Turn order for final round theme elimination

bids.description: Player bids mapped by player ID

questionData.description: Question data for the final round, set when transitioning from bidding to answering phase

FinalPhaseCompleteEventData.description: Data sent when a final round phase is completed

FinalQuestionEventData.description: Data sent when final round question is revealed

FinalSubmitEndEventData.description: Data sent when final round answering phase ends

allReviews.description: All answers revealed when transitioning to reviewing phase

QuestionFinishEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when a question is finished (showing answer)

nextTurnPlayerId.description: ID of the next player to take their turn, null if no next player (game finished)

FinalAutoLossEventData.description: Data sent when a player automatically loses in final round

playerId.description: ID of the player who lost

FinalAnswerLossReason.description: Reason for automatic loss in final round

AnswerReviewData.description: Data for reviewing final round answers

playerId.description: ID of the player

isCorrect.description: Whether the answer is correct (optional, present after review)

FinalAnswerType.description: Type of final round answer result

StakeBidType.description: Type of bid in stake question

StakeQuestionPickedBroadcastData.description: Data sent when a stake question is picked

pickerPlayerId.description: The player who picked the stake question

maxPrice.description: Maximum bid allowed for this question (null means no limit)

timer.description: Timer for the bidding phase (30 seconds per bid)

StakeBidSubmitInputData.description: Data for stake question bid submission

bidAmount.description: Bid amount for normal bids, null for pass/all-in bids

StakeBidSubmitOutputData.description: Data sent to all players when a bid is submitted

playerId.description: ID of the player who submitted the bid

bidAmount.description: Actual bid amount (null for pass bids)

isPhaseComplete.description: True if bidding phase is complete and this player won

nextBidderId.description: Next player to bid (null if phase complete)

timer.description: Timer for the next bid or remaining time (30 seconds per bid)

StakeQuestionWinnerEventData.description: Data sent when stake question bidding completes and winner is announced. Question data is sent separately via QUESTION_DATA event.

winnerPlayerId.description: ID of the player who won the bidding

SecretQuestionGameData.description: Data saved to game state in order to understand current secret question state

pickerPlayerId.description: The player who originally picked the secret question

transferPhase.description: Whether currently in transfer phase (waiting for transfer decision)

StakeQuestionGameData.description: Data saved to game state in order to understand current stake question state

pickerPlayerId.description: The player who originally picked the stake question

maxPrice.description: Maximum bid allowed for this question (null means no limit)

bids.description: Current bids from all players (playerId -> highest bid amount)

passedPlayers.description: Players who have passed and are out of bidding

biddingOrder.description: Order of players for sequential bidding

currentBidderIndex.description: Current player's turn to bid (index in biddingOrder)

winnerPlayerId.description: Player ID who placed the highest bid (winner)

SocketIOStakeQuestionSubmittedEventPaylo.description: Data sent to all players when a player submitted a bid

playerId.description: ID of the player who submitted the bid

SocketIOStakeQuestionPickedEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when a stake question is picked

pickerPlayerId.description: ID of the player who picked the question

biddingOrder.description: List of ID's of the players in order of bidding

SocketIOStakeQuestionWinnerEventPayload.description: Data sent to all players when stake question bidding completes and winner is announced. Question data is sent separately via QUESTION_DATA event.

winnerPlayerId.description: ID of the player who won the bid
